channel.title: QuizInk - The e-magazine
channel.description: Recent content on QuizInk - The e-magazine

item.title: Voice of the Streets
item.description: “There’s not a man that can’t be thrown, not a horse that can’t be rode, a bull that can’t be stopped, there’s not a disco that I Coke La Rock can’t rock” -Coke La Rock.

item.title: A Step Towards Teleportation
item.description:
Let’s travel and yet not let allow time to travel.

It ain’t the platform 9¾ nor the transporter from the Star Trek Universe. The Eye of Agamotto was a feast to our eyes, sadly, Dr. Strange didn’t share the science. But now is the time for fiction to transition into reality.

item.title: About Us
item.description: This is the e-magazine of QuizInc, the offical quizzing club of NIT Durgapur. The website is powered by Hugo and is hosted on GitHub Pages. Like what you see? Contact us on our official social platforms or drop us an e-mail and we’ll get back to you!
